Class Checkout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart.Checkout

  • public class Checkout
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the result of a calculation of a shopping cart

      • calculate

        public static Checkout calculate(java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,CartItem> items,
                                 java.util.Map<Category,java.util.List<CartItem>> groupedItems,
                                 java.util.List<Campaign> campaigns,
                                 java.util.List<Coupon> coupons)
        Processes all items, campaigns and coupons
        Parameters:
        items - Items in the cart
        groupedItems - Items in the cart grouped by their categories
        campaigns - Campaigns added to the cart
        coupons - Coupons added to the cart
        Returns:
        A Checkout containing the results
